data.title: North Willamette Valley
data.meta_description: Speak with a Home Ownership Counselor today to find out how your financial future can improve through building an Adair home in North Willamette Valley.
data.text:
The Pacific Northwest is a special place to live. Our sense of community, connectivity, and civic pride are rare finds these days — plus three hundred days of green. The historic town of Aurora is nestled along the banks of the Pudding River. Though little Aurora rests in the heart of the Willamette Valley, she is still within striking distance of Portland. It’s no surprise we attract visitors from all over the United States. No wonder so many new families are moving to the North Willamette Valley!

It is with particular pride that Adair Home’s serves this region by providing top quality, attractive houses for every budget. Adair Homes believes in the life-changing power of home ownership. Through our unique home building process, Adair homes realize built-in equity from day one! Speak with one of our Homeownership Counselors today to find out how your financial future might be positively impacted through building an Adair home.
